FuncDef:
The map rule command creates a basic mapping rule (BMR) and displays the BMR view.
The undo map rule command deletes a BMR.
By default, no BMR is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a BMR name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the MAP-T or MAP-E function is configured, to set a BMR, run the map rule command. A maximum of 4096 BMRs can be configured on each device.
Precautions
BMRs can be referenced by DHCPv6 address pools, and referenced BMRs cannot be modified.
